programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu. Komanda palīdz popzvaigznei nogādāt savu autobusu pilsētā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad mamma palīdz Trušu jaunkundzei ugunsdzēsēju depo, viņu izsauc nodzēst liesmas tēta nekontrolējamajam grilam!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāki ierodas uz vakariņām pie mammas un tēta. Pepa un Džordžs ir pārāk noguruši, lai ietu gulēt, kamēr nav dzirdējuši pasaku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa no dārziņa atnes lācīti, par ko rūpēties, bet viņa raizējas, ka viņam nebūs jautri.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir suņa Denija dzimšanas diena, un ar vectēva Suņa un vectēva Cūkas palīdzību bērni piedalās pirātu dārgumu medībās.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Visi Pepas pilsētas iedzīvotāji vēlas satikt Kartupeļa kungu, kas ieradies atvērt jauno sporta centru.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Gazeles jaunkundze ved Pepu un viņas draugus izbraucienā ar vilcienu, kur viņiem jāatzīmē aktivitāšu lapas. Tikmēr Pedro visu laiku pazaudē savu biļeti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas dārziņā ir talantu diena. Gazeles jaunkundze grib, lai visi parāda savus īpašos talantus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas ģimene dodas uz muzeja Mēness izstādi kopā ar Džordža draugu ziloni Edmondu. Bet Pepa domā, ka viņi dodas uz īsto Mēnesi, un raizējas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs aizved Pepu un Džordžu uz rotaļlaukumu, bet nesaprot bērnu noteikumus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi.

Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū visu pieraksta dienasgrāmatā.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Mistera Stingrā dvīņi apciemo barbabērnus. Barbabērni sarīko dvīņiem dārgumu medības un atpūtu dabā. Barbapapas sodas jaunā piedzīvojumā... dārzā. Taču dzīvot dabā ir negaidīti sarežģīti.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sarīko Mateo dzimšanas dienas svinības, bet viss nenotiek kā iecerēts. Vai Braunas kundzes klauns izglābs situāciju? Padingtons nejauši spēles laikā atdod Džonatana reto Robotiņa kartīti. Kā viņš to atgūs?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Bērdas kundzes diena, un Padingtons grib izmantot tortē marmelādi no īpašās burkas, taču neviens to nespēj atvērt. Kā viņš izrādīs pateicību? Padingtons un Mateo nodibina galda tenisa komandu un pārspēj huligānus, lai spēlēt varētu visi.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atklāj, ka Karija kunga atvaļinājuma laikā ir laistījis aplamu augu. Brauna kundze grib, lai Vindzoras dārzi mākslinieciski izpaužas. Padingtons nezina, kas ir māksla, tāpēc izlemj noskaidrot, kas viņam padodas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons nejauši iznīcina vāveres riekstu krātuvi, tāpēc ielūdz savvaļas dzīvnieku dzīvot mājā. Džūdijai uzdāvina spiegošanas komplektu, Bērdas kundze sāk aizdomīgi izturēties, tāpēc bērni un Padingtons izseko viņu ar spiegu rīkiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel must give a presentation on what she wants to be when she grows up, she is excited to share her dreams of being a geologist! Wanting to wow her classmates, she wishes she could excavate an "out of this world" rock to show them. Cosmo and Wanda poof her underground to find a super special rock, and she does! But in the process, she angers a group of rock monsters and must use her knowledge of geology to win them over, get her rock back, and escape the cave!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Will and Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jacks suitcase and tries to hide the evidence. Jack tries to find "the big picture" as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When her parents wont let her have french fries for every meal, Hazel wishes for unlimited fries. But Cosmo and Wanda fail to mention that eating so many magical fries would turn her into a potato! For help Cosmo, Wanda, and Hazel pay a visit to Mother Nature, where Hazel accidentally eats the prized "mother potato." Can she reconcile her fry fixation and get back in Mother Natures good graces, or will Hazel have to face her wrath while stuck as a potato forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family prepares for war, AKA a trip to the local Asian market. After their battle to procure a rare cookie, Jack feels more part of the family. // The Groom and Board gets a bad review. Lily tries to find the culprit and "correct the record".

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family prepares for war, AKA a trip to the local Asian market. After their battle to procure a rare cookie, Jack feels more part of the family. // The Groom and Board gets a bad review. Lily tries to find the culprit and "correct the record".

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Will and Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jacks suitcase and tries to hide the evidence. Jack tries to find "the big picture" as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is desperate to have Squidward visit him at home, but Squidward says theres no reason for him to come over, especially when hes perfectly comfortable in his own home. // All of SpongeBobs square pants have shrunk in the dryer. When he goes to the store to buy some more, he finds that the store is all out of square pants! With no other choice, SpongeBob decides to try a new look - round pants!

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: Optimus Prime suspects G.H.O.S.T. is hiding something and sends Bumblebee on a secret recon mission deep inside G.H.O.S.T. HQ. The young Maltos sneak in and help their mentor.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Determined to stay "chill", Abbey bottles up her feelings and accidentally freezes her friends. // As Meowlowdy and Purrsephone prepare to play a Hissfits show, Meowlody must learn that her unique skills are a strength, not a weakness.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best is too anxious to sleep, but Bester knows what to do. He needs to count sheep! Or count one sheep to be exact. // The twins help Flip Flop with her milkshake deliveries, but find one very difficult customer impossible to satisfy.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester go on a mission to find out what gives their favourite cereal "Tenta-Flakes" such a purply taste. // Besters outlandish ideas to make mini golf fun for the customers nearly lead to disaster, but Best saves the day.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bests sound effects threaten to derail Besters one chance to shine on the opening night of a Flip Flops play. // Best and Besters "inbestigation" into some missing golf balls escalates into a full-blown mountain rescue mission.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: The hamsters mount an undersea expedition through the depths of the familys new aquarium to retrieve Popcorns lost crown. // When Popcorn gets stage fright at a local hamster pageant, Clover must save the kingdom of Hamsterdale by competing herself.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Feline Fervor: King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets. A kindly old lady thinks hes a cat and swoops him up. Hes encroaching on anothers turf, though - the apartments already home to a feline-impersonator, a female ferret named Zoe. Julien is taken with Zoe, and puts on his best seduction moves. Will the street-smart ferret succumb to his kingly charms? Smart money says… you never know! Action Reaction: Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when hes doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon. Guess what this means… no more going on missions! Sitting behind a desk doing paperwork instead! Hans takes advantage of the situation and targets a massive weapons lab, and without Skipper the penguins are easily captured. How can Skipper combat the evil puffin if hes in a puffy state?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Mental Hen: Kowalski has a rival, if you even can call it a rivalry. A Delaware Blue Hen has taken up residence at the zoo, and she has the amazing ability to predict the future! Kowalski doesnt buy the psychic chicken hype and sets out to discredit her. The truth turns out to be far more sinister than a simple sports-pickin chicken, and Kowalski will have to use all his best moves to wiggle out of this mess. Thumb Drive: The penguins need a thumb, and Maurices fits the bill nicely. Using the opposable digit thumbprint to break into a secret weapons lab gets the penguins all atwitter. King Julien is unhappy that his right hand man is running around on missions with the birds so he sets out to sabotage the mission. As with most of King Juliens plans, this scheme turns out to be "thumbs down"!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: Mo and Hashtag visit the ruins for a class project and uncover a giant secret living beneath town.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: The Boo Crew vacations in the Bermuda Triangle while Dracula considers which Were-Ruler candidate to endorse. // Clawdeen investigates a destroyed sandcastle that could change the fate of the election and discovers surprises on the island.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Sharing isnt easy for the twins and after a particularly heated argument they decide split the treehouse in half. // In order to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Besters new pet comes between her and her brother. Theres nothing to it, Best must splat the cockroach! // Best and Bester go on an epic quest for a talking whale to prove they answered a board game question correctly.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best ruins Besters painting by accident so in order to avoid hurting her feelings he blames an innocent chicken. // Having lost their soccer ball over the garden fence, the twins have no option but to find a way to get it back.

programme.title: Harvey Beaks
programme.desc: Welcome to the peck-uliar world of Harvey Beak, a moderately mellow young bird who flies around his magical forest home of Littlebark Grove, with best-bird friends Fee and Foo, a pair of boisterous twins. The three feathered friends are always looking for new things to do, zooming around the forest embarking on adventures. With many other animals living in the forest, theres plenty of new characters and creatures for the trio to meet, often involving them on their mischievous escapades. Harvey lives with his parents, Irving Beaks and Miriam Beaks.

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: Wallykazam! is about the adventures of Wally Trollman and his pet dragon, Norville. Wally has a magic stick that makes words come to life; each story has a new set of magic words, and Wally uses these words to playfully transform the world around him.

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When the group arrives at a small Earth Kingdom mining town, they see an earthbender, named Haru, who is practicing his ability, but he runs away when Katara tries to confront him about it. They soon learn that the Fire Nation has taken over the town, that earthbending is forbidden and all earthbenders are taken away to an offshore prison. However, when an elderly man is trapped in a collapsed mine, Katara urges Haru to use his powers to save the mans life, but then, the old man reports Haru to the authorities. Katara blames herself for his predicament and she vows to rescue him, but will she succeed?

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Antics on Ice: Privates in heaven - icy, freezing heaven. The Lunacorns on Ice extravaganza is in town, and Skippers determined to take him as a treat. Accompanied by unexpected fellow fanboys Bing and Roy, the gang heads to the arena. Things get a bit d-icey when the gorilla and rhino end up on the ice with the lunacorns. The enraged director is ready to shutter the whole thing unless they find some way to slip n slide out of it. Showdown on Fairway 18:A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo. The slippery armadillo needs Privates help to make good on an ill-advised bet with two gopher brothers. Whos the bad guy here though? The gophers show up at the zoo to actually warn the penguins about the kid! The story takes us on more twists and turns than a Pebble Beach golf hole!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Manas bērnības atmiņas
programme.desc: Viens no slavenākajiem Latvijas mūziķiem Zigfrīds Muktupāvels raidījumā "Manas bērnības atmiņas" atklās savas bērnības stāstus. Slavenākās Zigfrīda Muktupāvela piesaistes mūzikai ir grupas "Zodiaks" un "bet bet", protams, izcila sadarbība bijusi arī ar Maestro Raimondu Paulu un citiem mūziķiem, bet īpaši spilgti izskanēja atmodas laikā dziedātās dziesmas. Zigfrīds daudzus gadus bijis Latvijas Radio ētera personība un arī TV raidījumu vadītājs.

programme.title: Rezervēts
programme.desc: Viņa pati par sevi saka - esmu nīstākā žurnāliste Latvijā. Taisnības cīnītāja un mamma, kuras laime ir brīvdienu rīti, ar bērniem, gultā dauzoties. Viņai ir skaļa mute un dumpīgs raksturs. Tas vairāk sitis nekā devis. Karjerai ziedojusi sevi, tuvākos, bet neapzināti vienmēr pierādījusi tiem, kas teikuši - tu būsi nekas. Viņa redz no tāluma, cik ļoti cilvēki baidās no viņas. Tā ir vara. Viņa noslīgst tviterī un darbā. Taču patiesībā viņa mācās būt laimīga un baudīt - te un tagad. Rezervēts. Inga Sprinģe.

programme.title: Āzija
programme.desc: IT ir kļuvusi par populāru nodarbošanos Kirgizstānā. Ikviens vēlas iekļūt šajā nozarē, pat neatkarīgi no vai būs programmētājs, dizainers vai vadītājs. Kirgizstānā IT profesiju uzskata par modernu, daudzsološu un augsti apmaksātu. Kas noveda pie IT nozares uzplaukuma un kādi panākumi jau ir šajā jomā?

programme.title: Āzija
programme.desc: 2022.gada februārī daudzi krievi panikā meklēja vispieejamāko un ātrāko iespēju tikt ārpus Krievijas robežām, un tieši šī situācija ļāva Kirgizstānai apliecināt sevi kā Vidusāzijas valstij ar interesantu kultūru un zemām cenām veikalos.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Keramiķis Imants Klīdzējs ir ļoti daudzpusīgs mākslinieks gan savā radošajā darbībā, gan aktivitātēs. Talantīgs un iedvesmojošs pedagogs, Salacgrīvas mākslas skolas direktors, kura aizraušanās ir fotogrfēšana. Jau 17. gadu Imanta Klīdzēja keramikas darbnīcā augusts ir Naborigama mēnesis, jo tā ir vienīgā reize gadā, kad tiek kurināta japāņu tradicionālā keramikas apdedzināšanas krāsns. Šogad tā sākās ar starptautisku simpoziju, kurā mākslinieki gatavoja darbus tieši šai neparastajai krāsnij, un noslēdzās ar izstādi Salacgrīvas muzejā.

programme.title: Personības kods
programme.desc: Personības kodā šoreiz arhitekts, uzņēmējs un politiķis Uldis Pīlēns. Sarunā par to, vai izveidojot un gadiem vadot lielu uzņēmumu, iedvesma, radošums un spēja atkal radīt ko jaunu nepaliek otrajā plānā un, vai pēc prezidenta vēlēšanām joprojām ir vēlme darboties politikā.

programme.title: Brīvdienas sākas tagad!
programme.desc: Šoreiz abas raidījuma vadītājas viena otrai sagatavojušas aizraujošas brīvdienas. Keita Nikiju vedīs uz Alūksni un brīvdienu piedzīvojumu iesāks ar elpu aizraujošu nobraucienu pāri Alūksnes ezeram, savukārt atlikušo dienu, kā jau Nikijai tas patīk, saplānojusi mierpilni. Bet, Nikija Keitu iepazīstinās ar auto pasauli, lai sagatavotu dienas noslēgumam, kas nenoliedzmai būs aktīvs, jo abas meitenes izklaidēsies sporta kompleksā "333"! Smelies idejas piedzīvojumiem un košām atmiņām raidījumā "Brīvdienas sākas tagad!".

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Raidījums "Meža veca emuāri" Māra Oltes virsvadībā dosies satikt dažādu paaudžu un amatu cilvēkus, kurus vieno viens kopīgs vaļasprieks - makšķerēšana! Dosimies izzināt Latvijas čempionāta spiningošanā no krasta ar mākslīgo mānekli aizkulises.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Laikā, kad cilvēku dzīves un ikdienu ierobežoja Covid-19 pandēmija, skolotaja Inta Žube ieraudzīja izdevību un izveidoja uzņēmumu, lai online vidē skolēniem pasniegtu privātstundas matemātikā. Bet pie tā Inta neapstājās. Šobrīd izveidojusi studiju, kur bērniem ir iespēja iepazīt tik aktuālās STEM (zinātne, tehnoloģijas, inženierija, matemātika) zināšanas. Inta ikkatrā bērnā saredz iespēju un potenciālu.

programme.desc: "Medijpratības aktualitātes" ir daļa no projekta "Medijapratības nodarbības Latvijas izglītības iestādēs", kurās Mg.sc.soc. Liene Ločmele jauniešus mudina kritiski izvērtēt pieejamo informāciju dažādās sociālo mediju platformās un vēršos uzmanību uz tādām tēmām kā informācijas pieejamība par mentālo veselību, slavenības un dezinformācija un mākslīgā intelekta radīti foto un video.

programme.desc: Auto, drošība uz ceļa, jaunāko noteikumu un likumu skaidrojumi. Raidījumā pastāstīsim par jaunākajām aktualitātēm, kas jāzina un jāņem vērā katram autovadītājam.

programme.title: Cēsu novads - izcila vieta dzīvei!
programme.desc: Cēsu novads ir vieta, kur seno amatu prasmes tiek nodotas no paaudzes paaudzē, veidojot dzīvu saikni ar mūsu vēsturi un kultūru. Vietējie meistari turpina kopt tādus amatus kā kokapstrāde, audēju māksla, podniecība un rotu kalšana, saglabājot senās tehnikas un pielāgojot tās mūsdienu vajadzībām. Šajā raidījumā Keita dosies iepazīties ar prasmīgiem amatniekiem, kas ar savām rokām veido unikālus darbus, kas ir ne tikai praktiski, bet arī skaisti kultūras simboli. Pievienojieties, lai atklātu šo seno, bet joprojām dzīvīgo amatu pasauli!

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Valmiermuižas vārds vēl ne tik senā pagātnē vispirms jau saistījās ar Valmieras cietumu, cietums te ir joprojām, bet Valmiermuižas vārds tagad vairāk saistās ar dažādām kultūras norisēm - Etnomūzikas festivālu, gadskārtu ieražu svinībām, dzīvās mūzikas un kino vakariem, un vēl daudz citiem pasākumiem. Šo pārmaiņu pamatā, nenoliedzami, ir Valmiermuižas kultūras biedrības paveiktais un šo biedrību jau astoņus gadus vada Sabīne Vandāna. Biedrības ieguldījums ir bijis arī būtisks pētot vēsturi, jo Valmiermuiža ir hernhūtiešu kustības sākums Vidzemē, kas bija ļoti būtisks solis izglītības attīstībā.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: 1994. gadā daži autosporta entuziasti brikšņiem aizaugušā teritorijā, kas turklāt atradās blakus cūku fermai, uzsāka būvēt autotrasi, un jau rudenī tur notika pirmās sacensības. Tāds bija Smiltenes autotrases "Teperis" sākums, un visu šo laiku tā ir turpinājusi dzīvot un attīstīties. Gandrīz kopš pašiem pirmsākumiem ar trasi saistīts arī smiltenietis Vairis Tralla, kurš zina stāstīt par katru trases līkumu un to, cik daudz laika, spēka un, pats galvenais, entuziasma prasa šīs infrastruktūras uzturēšana.

programme.title: Ceļā uz mājām
programme.desc: Arī vistas ir pelnījušas dzīvot ērtā namiņā un pie tāda tikt var gan pašrocīgi, gan meklējot ekspertus ar zināšanām. Epizodē uzzini cik daudz instrumenti nepieciešami, lai taptu viena vistu māja veselai vistu saimei un gailim.

programme.title: Mēs darām tā
programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.desc: Pelēkam rudenim piestāv košas krāsas, un tās raidījums "ĒdienKarte" meklēs Jūrkalnē. Košums būs gan suitu sievas tērpā, gan sulīgajā valodā. Ir grēks Jūrkalnē nepagaršot ķiļķēnus ar gaļu un neieskatīties Latvijā vienīgajā Vētru muzejā - jo spēks ir ne tikai Jūrkalnes vējā, bet arī vietējo cilvēku idejās.

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Metropolīts Aleksandrs Kudrjašovs Latvijas Pareizticīgajā Baznīcā pieredzējis gan garīgus pacēlumus, gan izaicinājumus, taču vienmēr saglabājis uzticību savam aicinājumam un Dieva vadībai. Par dzīves izvēlēm, personīgo redzējumu un aicinājumu šajā epizodē viņa personstāsts.

programme.title: Ceļot bez robežām
programme.desc: Noslēdzošā Šrilankas sērija, Ceļot bez robežām dienu pavada ajūrvēdas viesnīcā, Evita piedzīvo skaistu ziedu vannu, bet Ivaram masāža. Vakarā komanda dodas uz pilsētu un apmeklē templi, bet nākamais rīts Evitai sākas ar rīta vingrošanu, okeāna krastā. Šajā dienā tiks apmeklēta vēl viena skola, kurā bērniem komanda uzdāvinās ūdens pudeles un bērni ir sagatavojuši vēstules, ko aizvest Dobeles ģimnāzijas bērniem.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Ceļā uz mājām
programme.desc: Arī vistas ir pelnījušas dzīvot ērtā namiņā un pie tāda tikt var gan pašrocīgi, gan meklējot ekspertus ar zināšanām. Epizodē uzzini cik daudz instrumenti nepieciešami, lai taptu viena vistu māja veselai vistu saimei un gailim.

programme.title: Ēdienkarte
programme.desc: Pelēkam rudenim piestāv košas krāsas, un tās raidījums "ĒdienKarte" meklēs Jūrkalnē. Košums būs gan suitu sievas tērpā, gan sulīgajā valodā. Ir grēks Jūrkalnē nepagaršot ķiļķēnus ar gaļu un neieskatīties Latvijā vienīgajā Vētru muzejā - jo spēks ir ne tikai Jūrkalnes vējā, bet arī vietējo cilvēku idejās.

programme.title: Līdakas un Leģendas
programme.desc: Brāļi Klēģeri šajā sezonā kopā ar draugiem dodas uz zivīm bagāto Kurzemi, meklējot ne tikai līdakas un citas zivis, bet arī stāstus, leģendas un piedzīvojumus. Pirmajā sērijā viņi iepazīst leģendāro Vadakstes makšķernieci Astru un satiek arī Liepājas ezera matadoru Gunti Veitu.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 02:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 02:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV);02:45 Vidzemē (Vidzemes TV) 03:00 Runā Latgale (LRT).

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus.
